description: The Silverblood Promise by James Logan is published by Arcadia Books on 25th April. It will be available in Hardback, EBook and Audiobook. The Mother of Cities A sharp rap at his cabin door jolted Lukan from sleep. ‘Go away,’ he said – or tried to say. His tongue was gummed to the top of his mouth. He worked it free, grimacing at the sour aftertaste. Another rum-filled night. There had been plenty of those during the second week of his voyage. The ship’s captain – a jovial bear of a man by the name of Graziano Grabulli – had taken to inviting Lukan to his cabin each night for a glass or two (or several) of rum. Like most men from the Talassian Isles, he liked to talk, mostly about himself and his various exploits and escapades – of which there were many.
